newsitem.title: USA: Nicollet Process Q2 gross margin improves.
newsitem.headline: Nicollet Process Q2 gross margin improves.

text.p: Nicollet Process Engineering Inc said Tuesday its gross margin for the February 28 second quarter was 33 percent compared with 13 percent a year earlier.
The company posted a loss of $0.14 per share compared to a year-earlier quarterly loss of $0.19 per share. Average shares outstanding increased to 3.3 million from 2.1 million.
President Robert Pitner said higher sales in the quarter began to reflect an increase for the company's new die casting product with advanced monitoring capabilities.
Nicollet Process designs, manufactures and markets process monitoring, control and server-based distributed computing systems.
